title: Spiced marinated rabbit with herbed couscous and pine nuts
description: Rabbit tastes wonderful with a hint of added spice in this dish. Serve alongside herby couscous for a delicious evening meal.
ingredients: 2 tbsp finely chopped coriander root (available from Asian stores; if unavailable, substitute coriander leaves and stalks)
2 tbsp finely chopped fresh mint leaves
3-4 banana shallots, thinly sliced into rounds
4 canned piquillo peppers (available from some supermarkets and Spanish delis), drained and finely chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
